alert.note: Alert for Houston; Madison (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 10:09PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will produce strong wind gusts across portions of northeastern Grimes, northeastern Brazos, southwestern Houston, Madison and northwestern Walker Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Austonio to 9 miles northwest of Madisonville to 12 miles east of Franklin. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madisonville, Austonio, Lovelady and North Zulch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
